content.rendered:
Home

The Best Flutter App Development Company in India

Save time, and get your app delivered to all devices with a single codebase. With our custom flutter App development services, you can get exceptional & efficient apps for all screen sizes without breaking the bank.

Flutter + Codevian:
Save Time and Resources

We are a Flutter App development company in India that is well-known for creating excellent, cross-platform mobile applications. We design apps that run flawlessly on both iOS and Android using Flutter’s adaptability and our developer’s expertise — removing the necessity for separate development cycles. This not only saves time but also drastically decreases costs. Our Flutter expertise speeds up app development, resulting in a better user experience, lower costs, and faster delivery.

Why Flutter and us?

Flutter can work perfectly on both iOS and Android

Our competence can guarantee a quick time-to-market.

Flutter can easily handle complicated apps.

We can use Flutter to create interacting interfaces

You can expect lower expenses resulting from less development efforts

Browse our broad Flutter development services, which are customized to your particular app development requirements. From design to deployment, our skilled Flutter developers use modern tools to ensure the success of your project.

Can’t find the Flutter development service you need? Contact us, and we’ll be delighted to discuss your requirements.

Contact us

Flutter Development Services We Offer

Custom Flutter App Development

We can create a custom Flutter App for you, starting from the ground up to bring your unique app concept to reality. Our team of professionals guarantees your app is precisely designed, developed, and launched.

Flutter UI/UX Designing

Our skilled developers use design concepts to create compelling and customer-focused interfaces that ensure high satisfaction and retention. We prioritize creating apps that are both useful and aesthetically pleasing.

Flutter App Migration

We can easily migrate your existing app to Android and iOS platforms using Flutter, to improve performance and cross-platform capabilities while decreasing interruptions while maintaining user base during the transfer.

Flutter API Development & Integration

We can help you with API development and connect your existing app to external services and databases, allowing it to be more functional This will make it more adaptable and beneficial to your users.

Flutter Web app development

We create web applications using Flutter to ensure that your software runs smoothly across multiple devices and platforms, such as mobiles, laptops, and tablets, increasing its reach and efficiency.

Flutter App Team Augmentation

Hire our Flutter developers to bring a wealth of expertise to your table. With our skilled developers, you can expand the potential of your project, and speed up the development process — while saving costs!

Flutter Support & Maintenance

With regular updates, bug fixes, and optimizations, we’re here to make sure your app keeps running smoothly once it’s launched,. We actively monitor your app, swiftly addressing and resolving any issues that may arise. 

Flutter App Consulting

By leveraging our knowledge and insights, our team of Flutter experts guarantees that you make educated decisions. With our help, you’ll be able to get around the Flutter landscape with trust, saving time and resources.

Our Smooth Process

We follow agile practices right from brainstorming ideas & development to post-launch support and updates. Here’s an overview of our easy process for iOS app development. 

Planning & Strategizing

During the planning process, our team does a thorough requirement assessment, working with you to understand the objectives, target audience, and requirements of your project. We then plan the app’s design and functionality to ensure that it fully corresponds with your aims, and we build a plan of action for the project.

UI/UX Designing

Our skilled UI/UX designers turn your project’s idea into visually appealing visuals and user interfaces, emphasizing a user-centric approach for a joyful app experience. We create wireframes, prototypes, and designs that are not only consistent with your brand identity but also promote user engagement.

Development & Testing

Our expert Flutter developers use the newest technologies to design the key functionality of your app while adhering to best practices and agile approaches.

Our comprehensive testing techniques detect and correct any flaws or difficulties, ensuring that your software works smoothly across all devices and platforms.

Deployment

We deploy your mobile app, assuring a smooth and trouble-free process for iOS, Android, or both platforms at the same time. Our deployment method involves extensive quality checks and optimization to ensure that your software is ready to hit the app stores.

Post-Launch Support & Maintenance

After the launch, we offer continuous support and maintenance to keep your Flutter app secure, up-to-date, and optimized for emerging technologies and user needs.

Our professional support team is ready to address any issues as soon as they arise, ensuring that your app continues to deliver great performance and customer happiness.

Check out our engagement models to

Learn More

Ready to kickstart your flutter project?

Contact us

Hire Flutter Developers

Hire our Flutter app developers to augment your team and take your company to new heights. With years of Flutter development experience, our team of skilled developers bring a wealth of knowledge to your projects. Their technical expertise, pleasant attitude, and fluent English communication guarantee that they blend smoothly into your team, generating exceptional outcomes and promoting collaborative success.

  • Fast and effortless onboarding
  • Flexible engagement models 
  • Fluent communication skills
  • Minimum of 3 years of experience
  • Agile development methodologies

Our Tech Stack

Our developers use a variety of tools and technologies, carefully picking the best ones for your project’s particular needs.

Frameworks

  • Inkino
  • MediaQuery
  • Material
  • Velocity_x
  • Get X

Libraries

  • Fl_chart
  • GetIt
  • Rxdart
  • Dio
  • SQLite
  • Url_launcher
  • Flushbar

Programming Languages

  • Dart

Databases

  • Sqlite
  • Firestore
  • Hive

ORM

  • Sqfentity
  • Jaguar_orm
  • PostgREST

Tools & Plugins

  • Flutter Tree
  • Markdownlint
  • Expo
  • SpriteWidget
  • Flutter SDK
  • Dart SDK
  • Flutter SVG

A Flutter App for Every Industry

Whether you’re looking to develop a Flutter app for banking operations or distance education — our developers possess expertise tailored to your specific industry, ensuring precise solutions that meet your unique requirements.

Healthcare

We create apps that provide healthcare professionals with efficient patient management and telemedicine solutions.

Entertainment

Whether it’s through gaming, streaming, or interactive media experiences, our  apps bring entertainment to life.

Real Estate

We provide  applications that make it easier for real estate professionals to manage their properties and conduct virtual tours and property searches.

Retail

Our  apps’ easy navigation, secure transactions, and tailored shopping experiences improve the e-commerce experience.

Wellness & Fitness

Our apps’ easy navigation, secure transactions, and tailored shopping experiences improve the e-commerce experience.

Transport & Logistics

Our  apps’ easy navigation, secure transactions, and tailored shopping experiences improve the e-commerce experience.

E-commerce

Our  apps’ easy navigation, secure transactions, and tailored shopping experiences improve the e-commerce experience.

Banking & Finance

We offer financial institutions  solutions that guarantee safe mobile banking and effective money management.

Travel & Hospitality

Our applications improve the travel and hospitality sectors by providing booking tools, guest services, and travel management resources.

Education

We assist educators with apps for e-learning, classroom administration, and student engagement.

Manufacturing

We serve the manufacturing industry by improving the supply chain, automating processes, and increasing industrial efficiency.

Start today

Why choose us?

Many companies rely on us for outstanding results because we don’t just tackle problems, we offer customized solutions that address your business challenges, assuring your success.

1. 100% Security:

We prioritize the protection of your data and intellectual property, putting in place effective measures to protect your assets.

2. Rapid Development

With our skilled developers, we can accelerate your project's progress, reducing time-to-market and boosting your competitive edge.

3. Cost-effective

We provide cost-effective solutions without sacrificing quality, allowing you to get the most out of your investment.

4. Agile Development Practices

We use agile methodologies to ensure flexibility, adaptability, and a smooth development process adapted to your demands.

5. Top Talent On-Board

Our team is comprised of top-tier Flutter developers having years of experience and they can bring great skills and expertise to your project.

6. Transparency

We keep lines of communication open, delivering regular project updates and appreciating your participation and feedback.

Want to Explore More Options?

Not sure if you want to go with Flutter? Check out our other mobile app development services

Contact us

Android App Development

React Native App Development

Flutter App Development

iOS App
Development

Flutter Development FAQs

Can’t find what you’re looking for? Don’t worry, our dedicated executives are here to assist you. Get in touch by clicking below.

Contact Us
Can I hire your developers for my projects?

Absolutely! We provide flexible engagement models, so you may make use of our talented developers for your projects. No matter what your requirements are, we have a pool of talented developers who can merge with your team for Flutter projects.

Can you convert my existing app into Flutter?

Yes, we specialize in app modernisation and can migrate your existing app to Flutter to ensure that your users get a consistent, cross-platform experience.

How much does it cost to develop a Flutter app?

The cost of creating a Flutter app varies based on criteria such as complexity, features, and design. We can offer you an exact quote after learning about your business and assessing your needs.

What are the benefits of Flutter?

Flutter is a UI software development kit offered by Google and it has numerous benefits:

  • Single Codebase that works on multiple devices like Desktop, iOS and Android.
  • Ability to inject hot reload to speed up development.
  • Easily create stunning, custom interfaces.
  • Create high-performance native applications.
  • Flutter is an Open Source, meaning you can take advantage of a lively and supportive community.
Shall I Choose Flutter over React Native for my mobile app?

Both Flutter and React Native have their pros and cons. When deciding between Flutter and React Native, it’s essential to evaluate your specific project requirements and choose the framework that aligns best with your mobile app development needs. If you’re unable to decide between Flutter and React Native, you can contact us and our team will gladly assist you 🙂

Is Flutter a good choice for developing mobile apps?

Absolutely! Flutter is a wonderful choice for mobile app development, especially if you want a cross-platform solution with native speed and a beautiful user experience.
